title: Appeals Court Throws Out Teens’ Climate Change Suit
itunes:title: Appeals Court Throws Out Teens’ Climate Change Suit
description:
Pat Parenteau, a professor at Vermont Law School, discusses a federal appellate court throwing out the landmark climate change lawsuit brought by 21 young people. He speaks to host June Grasso. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
